document_data.name: ''Elminster's Ecologies Appendix IIIa''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elminster's Ecologies Appendix IIIa''''' was an ecology [[book]] authored by [[Elminster Aumar]].
document_data.Description:
Physically, copies of the book were old and time-worn, representing tomes. ''Elminster's Ecologies Appendix IIIa'' was part of a larger collection of books, ''[[Elminster's Ecologies (in-universe)|Elminster's Ecologies]]''.

The content of the ecological manual explained rare and strange creatures around the vast continent of [[Faer√ªn]], some of them breeds of existing creatures. Elminster wrote descriptions of such creatures, as well as how to defeat them, if encountered. The following creatures were detailed in the appendix: [[dense pudding]]s, [[fire troll]]s, [[fission slime]]s, [[magic golem]]s and [[marilith]]s.

Many chests and bookshelves around [[Watcher's Keep]] kept copies of the guides, as the keep itself teemed with a huge variety of rare creatures.
